title: ISic020435
support: Fragment of rim of an amphora.

layout.p: The text is placed on the outer surface of the rim.

provenanceFound._: Found during the excavations undertaken in the 1960s and 1970s on the hill of Monte Castellazzo, near Poggioreale.

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana
